mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT cu.USER_ID ) num FROM CLUB_USER cu, CLUB_GAME_PLAY_RECORD cpr where (cu.USER_ID = cpr.NORTH_USER_ID or cu.USER_ID = cpr.EAST_USER_ID or cu.USER_ID = cpr.SOUTH_USER_ID or cu.USER_ID = cpr.WEST_USER_ID) and cpr.CLUB_ID = #{clubId} and FROM_UNIXTIME( cpr.START_TIME/1000, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT pr.ROOM_ID as roomId, pr.START_TIME as startTime, (select u.USER_NAME from `GAME_USER` u where u.USER_ID = pr.EAST_USER_ID) as eastUserName, pr.EAST_USER_ID as eastUserId, pr.EAST_USER_MONEY_RECORD as eastUserMoneyRecord, pr.EAST_USER_MONEY_REMAIN as eastUserMoneyRemain,
(select u.USER_NAME from `GAME_USER` u where u.USER_ID = pr.SOUTH_USER_ID) as southUserName, pr.SOUTH_USER_ID as southUserId, pr.SOUTH_USER_MONEY_RECORD as southUserMoneyRecord, pr.SOUTH_USER_MONEY_REMAIN as southUserMoneyRemain,
(select u.USER_NAME from `GAME_USER` u where u.USER_ID = pr.WEST_USER_ID) as westUserName, pr.WEST_USER_ID as westUserId, pr.WEST_USER_MONEY_RECORD as westUserMoneyRecord, pr.WEST_USER_MONEY_REMAIN as westUserMoneyRemain,
(select u.USER_NAME from `GAME_USER` u where u.USER_ID = pr.NORTH_USER_ID) as northUserName, pr.NORTH_USER_ID as northUserId, pr.NORTH_USER_MONEY_RECORD as northUserMoneyRecord, pr.NORTH_USER_MONEY_REMAIN as northUserMoneyRemain
from CLUB_GAME_PLAY_RECORD pr WHERE (pr.EAST_USER_ID = #{userId} OR pr.SOUTH_USER_ID = #{userId} OR pr.WEST_USER_ID = #{userId} OR pr.NORTH_USER_ID = #{userId}) and pr.CLUB_ID = #{clubId} and pr.START_TIME >= #{startTime} and pr.START_TIME <= #{endTime} ORDER BY pr.START_TIME DESC limit #{start},#{limit}

select sum(b.a) from ( select sum(EAST_USER_MONEY_RECORD) as a from CLUB_GAME_PLAY_RECORD where EAST_USER_ID= #{userId} and CLUB_ID = #{clubId} and FROM_UNIXTIME( START_TIME/1000, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d') union all select sum(SOUTH_USER_MONEY_RECORD) as a from CLUB_GAME_PLAY_RECORD where SOUTH_USER_ID= #{userId} and CLUB_ID = #{clubId} and FROM_UNIXTIME( START_TIME/1000, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d') union all select sum(WEST_USER_MONEY_RECORD) as a from CLUB_GAME_PLAY_RECORD where WEST_USER_ID= #{userId} and CLUB_ID = #{clubId} and FROM_UNIXTIME( START_TIME/1000, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d') union all select sum(NORTH_USER_MONEY_RECORD) as a from CLUB_GAME_PLAY_RECORD where NORTH_USER_ID= #{userId} and CLUB_ID = #{clubId} and FROM_UNIXTIME( START_TIME/1000, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
) b
